title: SIF: Family Business & Wealth Management
description:
The purpose of this course is to provide students the
opportunity to develop deep skills and understanding of the
theory and practice that underlie corporate governance
(CG) systems and its interaction with corporate financial
decisions. This course will focus on various issues in CG
with specific reference to the Asian context such as CG
structures in Asia and around the world, the effects of CG
on various corporate financial policies, and CG
mechanisms to solve agency conflicts. This knowledge is
particularly essential for doing business intelligently not
only in Asia and other emerging economies but also
developed countries.
